question: During a regular checkup, Dr. Stevens discovered a suspicious lesion on the floor of Paul's mouth and decided to perform an excision. Which CPT code covers the excision of an oral lesion?

While shaving, Robert accidentally caused a small cut on his chin that later became infected. He visited a healthcare provider who incised and drained the infected area. Which CPT code covers the incision and drainage of an infected cut?
Lucas, a professional swimmer, developed a cyst in his arm due to repetitive motion. The doctor decided to excise the cyst. Which CPT code represents the excision of a cyst?

Ella's doctor suspected she might have diabetes. He ordered a Hemoglobin A1c test to assess her average blood sugar levels over the past three months. Which CPT code represents the Hemoglobin A1c test?
Riley had an overactive thyroid and was recommended for a thyroid lobectomy. Which CPT code pertains to this procedure?
Dr. Lopez performs an excision of a tumor on the knee joint, deep, measuring 3.5 cm. What CPT code should be used for this procedure?
A patient has an abscess on the arm that Dr. Clarke incises and drains. Which CPT code best describes this service?
A patient was administered an injection of zoledronic acid, 1 mg, for osteoporosis. Which HCPCS Level II code should be used for this drug?
Dr. Mitchell administered anesthesia for a patient having a closed procedure on the humerus and elbow. What CPT code should be used?
A patient had a percutaneous nephrostomy tube placement. What CPT code should be used for this service?
